definitions.definition: The person who collects bets and pays out winnings at a gambling table, such as in a casino .
One who, at a public dinner party , sits at the lower end of the table as assistant chairman .

main_definition: The person who collects bets and pays out winnings at a gambling table, such as in a casino .
secondary_definitions: One who, at a public dinner party , sits at the lower end of the table as assistant chairman .
